TITLE: Ungrading
DEF: Assessment of process and result of an achievement that is not expressed as a grade
TASK: The Ungrading pattern supports an alternative approach to assessment, favoring learning and improvement over traditional letter grades. It fosters intrinsic motivation and self-reflection, while reducing the emphasis on competition. To effectively employ this pattern, a shift in mindset from both educators and students is needed, transitioning from a focus on grading to a more holistic, growth-oriented approach.
